messages.message: I can't find this info on this wiki (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/925762121/Eng+Owners) but which team owns `apps-server`? we are seeing significant docker build time increase in a particular release 23.01 for that image and wonder if we can get somebody to help investigate

i don’t think there’s a single owner for all of `apps-server`

do you know which commit increased the build time?

Thanks @shaunak I was wondering that, but that update was across releases, right? it is odd that it seems only occur to 23.01, or maybe it was just coincident that other releases all ran after 23.01 and not having to deal with this?
is it something can be ~done~ improved by updating our base image?

Yes, this was updated for all the releases.  I'm actually not sure why it only affected one release.  I think you might be right in that all the releases might have run after 23.01 and did not have to deal with this.
